name: Light Runner (Rewzu)
description:
Light Runner is a Compo game made for Ludum Dare 52.

Collect the lights.

How to play:
  • Avoid obstacles.
  • Collect the lights to see farther.
  • You are accelerating and can not slow down.
  • Survive as long as you can.
  • Have fun!
Default controls:
  • A/Left Arrow - Move left
  • D/Right Arrow - Move right
Have fun!
